General.Name: Consorcio ARA S. A. B. de C. V
General.Description: Consorcio ARA, S. A. B. de C. V., together with its subsidiaries, designs, constructs, markets, and promotes low-income and middle-income residential housing developments in Mexico. It operates through Real Estate and Shopping Centers divisions. The company also builds, manages, and leases shopping centers, single centers, and mini-shopping centers. In addition, it operates commercial premises. As of December 31, 2021, the company operated 6 shopping centers. Consorcio ARA, S. A. B. de C. V. was founded in 1977 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Park Plaza Tower II, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 05120
